name: cfmediaplayer
description: Creates an in-built media player that lets you play FLV files

params.name: width
params.description: Width of the media player, in pixels.

params.name: height
params.description: Height of the media player, in pixels.

params.name: hideBorder
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies if you want to hide border for the media player panel

params.name: controlbar
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies if you want to display the control panel for the media player

params.name: align
params.description: Specifies the vertical alignment of the media player.

params.name: onload
params.description: Custom JavaScript function to run on loading th player component.

params.name: bgcolor
params.description: The background color of the media player specified as a Hexadecimal value without a "#"

params.name: source
params.description: The URL to the FLV file.

params.name: name
params.description:
Name of the media player.
The name attribute is required when you invoke JavaScript functions.

params.name: quality
params.description: The quality of the media playback

params.name: hideTitle
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies if you want to hide title for the media player panel

params.name: oncomplete
params.description: Custom JavaScript function to run when the FLV file has finished playing.

params.name: onstart
params.description: Custom JavaScript function to run when the FLV file starts playing.

params.name: wmode
params.description: Specifies the absolute positioning and layering capabilities in your browser

params.name: autoPlay
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies if the media player should automatically play the FLV file on loading the CFM page.
